name: delete_task
description: Delete a task from the file system. Can search across all agents or target a specific agent. Supports both space-specific and global scopes.

agent.description: Optional: Agent ID to narrow the search (e.g., 'budget_tracker'). If not provided, will search all agents.

target_space.description: Optional: Target a specific named space (e.g., 'creative', 'education'). Defaults to current space.

scope.description: Where to delete the task from: 'space' (default) or 'global'
